metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10051 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. If the function filetracker_newchunk encounters an unsafe "Some(sfcm) => { ft.new_chunk }" item, then the program enters an smb/files.rs error condition and crashes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.4-1').
